name: No Chill
description:
Snowmaister, the giant evil snowman is wreaking havoc on the world. They have created an infinite blizzard across the globe, and only YOU can stop them.

You play as B. B. the fireball. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge past icicles and grow your flame. With full heat, you can take a jab at the evil Snowmaister. 3 hits should do the trick, and you may just be able to save the world!

WASD/joystick to move. Space/R Bumper to dodge. F/L Bumper to Use a Fire Flare.

Pick up the firey spirals to get a Fire Flare. Icicles slow your rage meter.
